message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.common.dto.ItemChangeSets' import. Should be before 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.core.ConfigConsts'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.common.dto.ItemDTO' import. Should be before 'com.ctrip.framework.apollo.core.ConfigConsts'.
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
